text: hananimkkeseo geubun-ui eunhyelo jusin geos-eulosseo insaeghage guneun jadeul-eun geugeos-i geudeul-ege joh-eun geos-ila jeoldae saeng-gagchi malla. sillo geugeos-eun geudeul-ege nappeun geos-ila. buhwal-ui nal geudeul-i insaeghage guldeon geosdeul-i geudeul mog-e meong-elo ssuiil geos-ila. haneulgwa daejiui yusan-eun hananim-ui soyula. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun il-e balg-eusin bun-ila
